channel.title: How do you make an object teleport you 2 times without doing the questions
channel.description: Ok, i want a fight pit (i alrady do) but i want it to bring me in the pits when i click on it when im out of the pit s and i want it to tele me out of the pits when im in the pits without doing the scroll question/answer thing because som1 could just simply attack the person and the scroll question would go off... how do i make it so i can tele 2 ways without the scroll thing?
